title: Issue with pixel 2
content: Hy Google when I update my google pixel2 to android 11 then the devices is stuck on bootloader after this issue I send the device on your Authorization service center paying with inspection charges after the diagnosis process completed he said me the devices is unrepairable how it's possible I don't believe that after that he send me a estimate the estimate charge cost is not very high but for me it's high then I rejected that offers after that he send my device me with oppend condition plz help Google sorry for my bad English
